#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

void LPSArray(int lps[],char sub[])
{
    lps[0]=0;
    int i=1,len=0;
    while(i<strlen(sub))
    {
        if(sub[len]==sub[i])
        {
            len++;
            lps[i] = len;
            i++;
        }
        else
        {
            if(len!=0)
                len = lps[len-1];
            else
            {
                lps[i] = 0;
                i++;
            }
        }
    }
}

int KMP(char str[])
{
    char s[11];
    int i,j =0;
    for(i=strlen(str)-1;i>=0;i--)
    {
        s[j] = str[i];
        j++;
    }
    s[j] = 0;
    int lt = strlen(str);
    int lp = strlen(s);
    //printf("lt: %d,lp: %d\n",lt,lp);
    int *lps = (int *)malloc(sizeof(int)*lp);
    LPSArray(lps,s);
    i=0;
    j=0;
    int k=1;
    //cout<<"TEXT: "<<str<<" ";
    //cout<<"PATTERN: "<<sub<<endl;
    while(i<lt)
    {
        if(s[j]==str[i])
        {
            //printf("i: %d, j: %d\n",i,j);
            i++;
            j++;
        }
        if(j==lp)
        {
            //printf("HI\n");
            k=0;
            j=lps[j-1];
        }
        else if(i<lt && s[j]!=str[i])
        {
            //printf("HI AGAIN\n");
            if(j!=0)
                j = lps[j-1];
            else
                i++;
        }
    }
    return k;
}

int main()
{
    int T,i,j,k,f=0;
    char str[11],sub[11];
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--)
    {
        cin>>str;
        k = KMP(str);
        if(k==0)
            printf("YES\n");
        else
            printf("NO\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
